title: sartoshi is born
body: sartoshi joins super rare and chooses the username sartoshi - satoshi, but into digital art

title: mfers nfts launch
body: sartoshi and west coast nfts launch the mfers collection at 0.069 eth per nft. mint launches at 4:20pm and sells out in minutes

title: zhoug0x tattoos a mfer on imp0ster
body: a commemorative nft is minted and sartoshi buys it -- legend

title: mfers - early sketches is auctioned
body: mfers - early sketches is auction yielding 8.50 eth, lobes604 gives away a mfer during a twitter spaces of the auction, and sartoshi refunded him for the give away

title: mfers bot is auctioned
body: mfers bot is auctioned and won by ricklatona for 8.50 eth

title: what are mfers
body: sartoshi publishes what are mfers providing the mfers backstory

title: skywriting in la care of mogul
body: mogul arranged for mfers nft to be written in the sky over la

title: mfers in times square
body: mogul arranged for mfers to be featured on a billboard in times square

title: inaugural mfers group photo in om
body: mleejr.eth organized the inaugral group photo in om

title: creyzies airdropped to mfers holders
body: sartoshi and rey airdrop creyzies to mfers holders

title: mfers next era & end of sartoshi
body: sartoshi announces his exit, providing the community with a split of the royalty payments

title: cc0 summer roof party
body: masterchan.eth organized a cc0 summer on the roof in om

title: a night with the mfers :)
body: lexito organizes an nft.nyc party for mfers at bogart house in brooklyn

title: who is sartoshi?
body: master chan publishes who is sartoshi, an article discussing the legacy of sartoshi
